caption:
This photograph captures a serene sunset scene set in a coastal landscape. The setting sun forms a vivid and luminous orb, partially obscured by rocky coastal formations, casting a warm, orange glow that permeates the scene. Beneath the sunset, the ocean gently touches a sandy shore, reflecting the vibrant hues of the sky.

In the foreground, a small, silhouetted figure can be seen paddling a canoe across a calm body of water, likely a river or estuary that flows into the sea. The water reflects the orange and pink tones of the sunset, adding a tranquil and reflective quality to the scene.

The background features rugged cliffs crowned with dense, dark greenery, contrasting sharply with the brightly lit sky. Above the horizon, a few small birds can be indistinctly seen flying, adding a sense of life and movement to the otherwise peaceful tableau.

Overall, the composition emphasizes the interplay between light and silhouette, with the natural elements combining to create a vivid and picturesque scene during the magical hour of sunset.
title: Fisherman beaches boat at sunset at the mouth of the Quinault River.
